description.value:
Once per game session, wearer can increase Strength, Toughness, and Willpower by 10 for one turn.

Requirements

Deathwatch Initiate may start with one appropriate Chapter Trapping. Chapter: Imperial Fists

Effect: Initiated

Notes: -
